about_the_game:
The To Trust an Incubus Art Book is 64 pages of game art, including Adults Only images from every sex scene in the game! Almost every page includes a paragraph describing the creator's journey. From the Kickstarter that raised almost $50,000, to the creative struggles, to how to write a dynamic stats based visual novel, and more!

This Full Color art book includes:
  • Early Character Sketches
  • Insight into Each Character's Purpose
  • Early Pencil Sketches of Art, Along with the Final Versions
  • Threesome, Twosome, and Solo CGs
  • Numerous Money Shots
  • Two or More CGs on Every Page
  • The Art Creation and Collaboration Process
  • How To Successfully Launch a Kickstarter
  • Tips on Making Your Own Visual Novel

Once you purchase and install/download the Art Book in the DLC list of To Trust an Incubus in your Steam Library, you can find the files for it in your Local Files. Right-click the name of the game (To Trust an Incubus) from the list of games in your library, click Properties, go to the Local Files tab, then click Browse Local Files. You'll find the art book in this folder.

content_descriptors.notes: This art book contains uncensored sex scenes from the To Trust an Incubus Game.  Sex happens between human and incubus characters.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux x86/x86_64
  • Processor: 1Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6+
  • Processor: 1Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
